H0.text: sending money home to the native country is an example of. Repatriation

H1.text: sending money home to the native country is an example of. Transfer

H2.text: sending money home to the native country is an example of. Donation

H3.text: sending money home to the native country is an example of. remittance

A4.text: A remittance is a non-commercial transfer of money by a foreign worker, a member of a diaspora community, or a citizen with familial ties abroad, for household income in their home country or homeland.

A5.text: Remittance is more than three times as large as the total global foreign aid.
